XMLDB.COMMENT: Table for tracking Deadlines for Course Modules

TABLE.NAME: deadline_deadlines
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores Deadlines that have been added to the system.

FIELD.NAME: cm_id
FIELD.COMMENT: Field for tracking the Course Module ID this deadline applies to

FIELD.NAME: date_open
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to store the opening date for a course module

FIELD.NAME: date_deadline
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to store the actual deadline for a course module

FIELD.NAME: date_cutoff
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to store the cutoff for submissions.

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to store the timelimit, specific to Quiz

FIELD.NAME: attempts
FIELD.COMMENT: Field to store the attempts, specific to Quiz
